steps.text: On your iPhone: Settings → Mobile Data → Add eSIM.
Choose “Use QR Code”, then scan the QR from O2.
If asked, confirm eSIM label and default line.

steps.html: Need device help? See <kbd>Settings</kbd> → <kbd>About</kbd> to confirm eSIM support.

tips: If transfer stalls, toggle Airplane Mode 10s, then retry.

steps.text: Text PAC to 65075 from your current SIM to get your code (free).
Give the PAC to O2 when ordering or in My O2 to keep your number.
Porting typically completes within 1 working day (Mon–Fri).

notes: Keep both lines active until the port finishes.

steps.text: Power cycle the device; confirm eSIM is the default line.
APN should be mobile.o2.co.uk; re‑apply if blank.
Check O2 profile update in Settings → General → About.

issues.title: Number transfer taking longer than expected

steps.text: Confirm PAC not expired and MSISDN matches order.
Keep old SIM in a phone and reachable during the window.
If >24h (working day), contact O2 porting support.
